com.ibm.aglets
Class ListenerList

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.AbstractSequentialList<E>
              java.util.LinkedList<ContextListener>
                  com.ibm.aglets.ListenerList
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<ContextListener>, java.util.Collection<ContextListener>, java.util.Deque<ContextListener>, java.util.EventListener, java.util.List<ContextListener>, java.util.Queue<ContextListener>
public final class ListenerList
extends java.util.LinkedList<ContextListener>
implements ContextListener

This class is used to hold a list of context listeners and to forward an event to each listener. The class works as a linked list, and for each call to notify an event, the class extract each context listener and forwards the event to it.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net 25/ago/07
See Also:
